page.description: Defines the indicator shown for a record in the List that has been modified.

discussion.p: The *[ui:CSS - Dirty row indicator]* property is the CSS applied to a row in the List that contains data that has been edited (modified.) Out of the box, the indicator shown is a yellow-orange triangle in the upper right-hand corner of the List row for the modified record.
Leave blank to use the default CSS.
